gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: A 1987 image of Steve Jobs after a visit to a new Apple factory in Fremont, California, from Doug Menuez’s book, Fearless Genius: The Digital Revolution in Silicon Valley 1985-2000. Menuez recently donated his images of Silicon Valley’s early years to Stanford University, but is retaining his copyright.
Views inside the Prints & Photographs Division of the Library of Congress, including a file of negatives, the reading room, a photo album being scanned and negative storage in a cold vault.
